Machine Learning

By: David Drobner

This is my site about AI (with a focus on Machine Learning) for the ICS4U assignment "ics4uwinteremergingtopics" Here, I will be discussing what machine learning is, how it works, it's applications and real world examples of those and the history of machine learning.
